sub_concepts.name: Atmospheric Circulation
sub_concepts.definition: The movement of air in the atmosphere, including wind patterns and ocean currents.

sub_concepts.name: Weather Patterns
sub_concepts.definition: The temporary and local weather conditions, including temperature, humidity, cloudiness, wind speed, and precipitation.

sub_concepts.name: Climate
sub_concepts.definition: The long-term average weather conditions in a particular area, including temperature, precipitation, and wind patterns.

sub_concepts.name: Jet Stream
sub_concepts.definition: A fast-moving band of air that flows across the upper atmosphere, playing a significant role in shaping weather patterns and the Polar Vortex.

sub_concepts.name: Arctic Oscillation
sub_concepts.definition: An atmospheric pressure pattern that affects the Northern Hemisphere, influencing the strength and position of the Polar Vortex.

sub_concepts.name: El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO)
sub_concepts.definition: A natural climate cycle that impacts global weather patterns, including the strength and position of the Polar Vortex.
